TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Button/CheckBox extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for the different states of the check box control. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.Button.CheckBox class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the check box control.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the VisualStyleElement.Button.CheckBox property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElement_Button_CheckBox1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#14](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.v_92_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#14](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.v_92_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a disabled check box in the checked state.
Docs.value: A that represents a disabled check box in the checked state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the CheckedDisabled property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the CheckedDisabled property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElement_Button_CheckBox8` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#21](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/e7963519-979f-4c38-9b3f-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#21](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/e7963519-979f-4c38-9b3f-_1.vb)]
